biotools.summary:
A novel sequence alignment algorithm based on deep learning of the protein folding code.

Protein sequence alignment via deep learning of the protein folding code.

Center for the Study of Systems Biology.

From evolutionary interference, function annotation to structural prediction, protein sequence comparison has provided crucial biological insights.
